channel.title: Crip, Blood, or Slob?
channel.description:
Would you rather be in the crips? C's up B's Down C's Up B's Down
l3T !t r@!n L3t !t fL00d L3t @ C^r!p k!lL a bkl0oD L3t !t r@!n l3T !t Dr!p K!lL @ sl0bK C^uz i C^l@im C^rip L3t !t r@!n L3t !t ThuNdh@ pUt @ sl0bK 6 f33t Undh@ W3n ! D!3 sh0 n0 p!tY bKr!nG m!! s0uL t0 G@nGst@ C^itY 6 FlY!n 5 Dy!n 6 PopP!n 5 DroPp!n C^@nT StOp wOnT StOp bK AlL d@y 3v3rYd@y Thr0w Dh3m C^'z ^ @nD Dh3m bk'z DoWn FuC^C^ @lL sl0bkz k!lL eM w!T mY Kn!f3 bK @lL d@y 3v3ryd@y C^R!P FOR L1F3
Or the Bloods? B's Up C's Down? Idk anything I like the crips
Or the Slobs? Nothing either lol
Which one?
